overview:
Mike Ford is the Founder & CEO of TownConnect, a social media startup dedicated to organizing and uniting families, friends and organization in local communities. He decided to start TownConnect after coaching his kids sports teams and volunteering at their school. Every local group seems to face the same problems organizing, communicating and scheduling their members and activities. Ford designed TownConnect with his town in mind believes other towns across the US (and beyond) will enjoy it too.

Before TownConnect, Ford was Senior Vice President, Sales and Marketing for Did-it Search Marketing, a leading interactive agency focused on auction based media. Ford’s first raw startup, Computer.com, began in my garage in 1999. Computer.com was a highly publicized, computer portal site for novice computer users.
